mapper.select: SELECT q.no as no, q.sj as sj, m.nm as nm, to_char(q.rgsde,'yyyy.mm.dd.') as rgsde, q.co as co FROM qna q, mber m WHERE q.writer_no = m.no(+) ORDER BY no DESC
SELECT q.sj as sj, to_char(q.rgsde,'yyyy-mm-dd mm:mi') as rgsde, q.co as co, q.cn as cn, m.nm FROM qna q, mber m WHERE q.no = #{no} AND q.writer_no = m.no(+)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna (no, writer_no, sj, cn) VALUES (seq_qna_no.nextval, #{writerNo}, #{sj}, #{cn})
mapper.update: UPDATE qna SET sj = #{sj}, cn = #{cn}, rgsde = sysdate WHERE no = #{no}
UPDATE qna SET co = co + 1 WHERE no = #{no}
